examples.chinese: 最近母爱泛滥的离谱,好想生个小孩
examples.translation: Lately, my motherly instincts are overflowing ridiculously; I really want to have a baby.

examples.chinese: 每次看她真的和看我女鹅一样的心情,啊啊啊母爱泛滥
examples.translation: Every time I look at her, I feel like I'm looking at my own daughter, ahhh, overflowing with motherly love.

examples.chinese: 不是每个女人一开始就母爱泛滥的,至少我不是,我以前真的不喜欢小孩
examples.translation: Not every woman overflows with motherly love from the start, at least I didn't; I really didn't like children before.
